title: Race To #1, Limping Lakers, Zion's PG Evolution
description:
Brian Windhorst, Marc Spears and Kirk Goldsberry discuss the race to the #1 seed in the Eastern Conference – if the 76ers need home court advantage that badly, will the Lakers be able to keep up in the West without LeBron & AD and Zion’s evolution into the Pelicans’ PG of the future. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
